紛呈.definition: brilliant and varied; (often in the combination 精彩紛呈|精彩纷呈[jing1 cai3 fen1 cheng2])

紛紛.definition: one after another; in succession; one by one; continuously; diverse; in profusion; numerous and confused; pell-mell

紛紜.definition: diverse and muddled; many and confused

紛雜.definition: numerous and confused; in a mess

紛飛.definition: to swirl in the air (of thickly falling snowflakes, flower petals etc); to flutter about
